name: Above the Stars
description:
Battle wave after wave of heinous enemy ships. Tackle ruthless foes and fight to defend your planet and species from sure fire destruction. There to keep you company, your ever-upbeat (often inappropriately so) AI assistant, Mac.

  • Deploy a sprawling system of structures across the world to smite your foes
  • Level them up and then upgrade them even further with individual bonuses
  • Empower your ship itself to help tackle the endless hoards
  • Even get more ships and defend your world from every angle
  • Then, when the bad guys are rubble and the world is safe, take the Ark onwards

A whole bunch of intriguing worlds, unique structures, ever-changing enemies, and way too much terrible voice acting.

Your new home awaits, Above the Stars!
